title: GREAT ARTICLE ON THE GREEN FIELD CAROUSEL. I WAS WONDERING IF ANYONE KNOWS WHAT HAPPEN TO THE G16 PARK TRAIN THAT WAS AT THE LAKE. WOULD BE NICE IF THAT COULD BE FOUND AND REFURBISHED TO OPERATIONAL CONDITION. I KNOW WILMINGTON HAS A GREAT RAILROAD HISTORY AND THAT WOULD SURELY ADD TO THE RAILROAD CONNECTION.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. City officials took it apart in 1974. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3111 I don't think MyReporter will be able to track down the remnants of it nearly 40 years later. But
